mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eume_user ( email, user_name, nickname, profile_image, provider_id, user_status, sigungu_id, birth_date, gender, phone, background_theme, login_fail_count ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{userName}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, #{providerId}, #{userStatus}, #{sigunguId}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{backgroundTheme}, #{loginFailCount} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, email, user_name, nickname, profile_image, provider_id, user_status, sigungu_id, birth_date, gender, phone, background_theme, last_login_date, login_fail_count, reg_date, upd_date FROM eume_user WHERE email = #{email}

SELECT user_id, email, user_name, nickname, profile_image, provider_id, user_status, sigungu_id, birth_date, gender, phone, background_theme, last_login_date, login_fail_count, reg_date, upd_date FROM eume_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE eume_user SET last_login_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, upd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE eume_user SET login_fail_count = login_fail_count + 1, upd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE eume_user SET login_fail_count = 0, upd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE eume_user SET user_status = #{userStatus}, upd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE eume_user SET profile_image = #{profileImage}, upd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
